item.description:
Is it a bad sign when you start to plan your drinking? Haha! Well this one is not all about the drinking but about mingling and catching up with friends so I've set upÂ  every third Thursday of the month as Thirsty Third Thursday - we don't want to get crazy!

Each month will be a new place so come with suggestions and recommendations for your favorite and convenient places.

Whether you drink beer, wine, cocktails or just water like the little parched guy in the photo, come out to have a great time and enjoy some great company!

To make it fun tell us your favorite drink in your RSVP!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar area.
item.name: Thirsty Third Thursday
